涀字的基本解释

涀
xiàn
古河名。a.在今中国陕西省高陵县;b.在今中国河南省叶县。

涀字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiàn］
［《廣韻》胡甸切，去霰，匣。］
(1)谓山上有水。
(2)见“涀水”。
(3)见“沁沁涀涀”。

涀字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　涀； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页625第25
【廣韻】胡甸切【集韻】形甸切，?音現。水名。【山海經】澧水，東流注于涀水。　又【集韻】輕甸切【韻會】經甸切【正韻】詰戰切，?音俔。義同。　又【集韻】吉典切，音繭。小溝也。　又【廣韻】胡禮切【集韻】戸禮切，?音䏿。水名。在高陵。

涀字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体旧字形
涀字的起名意思

古河名。

Basic explanation of words
Stir up
xiàn
Furukawa name. a. In Gaoling County, Shaanxi Province, China; b. In Yexian County, Henan Province, China.
Stir up
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xiàn］
["Guangyun" Hu Dian cut, go to chai, box. ]
(1) It means that there is water on the mountain.
(2) See "Jianshui".
(3) See "Qin Qin Chuan Chuan".
Stir up
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Character Department] 　涀; Kangxi strokes: 11; Page number: page 625 to 25
[Guang Yun] Hu Dian cut [Ji Yun] Shaped and cut, sound appears. Water name. [Shanhai Jing] Lishui, flows eastward to Zhuanshui.　[Ji Yun] Light Dian cut [Yun Hui] Jing Dian cut [Zheng Yun] Cross-examination and cut,? Yin. The same meaning.　 [Ji Yun] Ji Dian cut, sound cocoon. Small ditch also.　[Guangyun] Hu Liqie [Jiyun] 戸 Liqie,? Yin 䏿. Water name. In Gaoling.
